name: Papaya Gin Sling
description: Papaya Gin Sling is the perfect balance of gin and papaya. If you like the two, you will enjoy this for sure! You can also try a simpler alternative: shake Papaya Syrup, Gin and Lime Juice with Ice, then pour and enjoy.
directions: Shake gin,bitters,lime juice and papaya juice in a cocktail shaker with ice.
Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes.
Fill the rest of the way with soda water, stir and garnish with a pineapple stick or canned pineapple tidbits.
